courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of playing guitar with this beginner-friendly course. Perfect for aspiring guitarists of all levels.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: A complete guide to learning piano from scratch. Ideal for beginners wanting to explore music theory and practice.

courses.title: Drumming Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of drumming in this hands-on course. Develop your rhythm and drumming techniques quickly.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Start your journey to master the violin with this step-by-step guide. Perfect for beginners eager to learn music.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of playing the flute with easy lessons. A great start for anyone interested in wind instruments.
